gameDetails.matchup: New York Knicks vs Orlando Magic

keyFactors.title: Orlando Interior
keyFactors.description: Magic missing key bigs, weak on glass

keyFactors.title: Recent Form
keyFactors.description: Hit over in 7 of last 10 games

keyFactors.title: MSG Motivation
keyFactors.description: KAT playing well in front of home crowd

quarterBreakdown.description: Slow start on boards, only 2 rebounds
1 more rebound, only 3 at halftime - concerning
Only 1 rebound as Knicks cruised to blowout win

gameResults.gamePace: Fast pace but blowout reduced opportunities
gameResults.turningPoint: 3 rebounds at halftime - was never on pace to hit

whatWentWrong.title: Blowout Impact
whatWentWrong.description: 15-point win meant KAT played only 28 minutes

whatWentWrong.title: Slow Start
whatWentWrong.description: Only 3 rebounds at halftime, too much ground to make up

whatWentWrong.title: Game Script
whatWentWrong.description: Knicks dominated so heavily that contested rebounds were limited

postGameAnalysis.wasNormalVariance: The blowout nature of the game killed this prop. KAT played only 28 minutes. Game script matters for rebounding props.

closingLineValue.verdict: Slight negative CLV - line moved against us

keyTakeaways: Blowouts kill rebounding props - limited minutes
Game script is critical for big man props
Only 3 boards at half was a bad sign
Consider opponent quality and pace of play
verdict: Game script killed us. Knicks won by 15, KAT played only 28 minutes and finished with 8 rebounds. Blowout variance.
